mapper.select: SELECT DR.DR_ID drId, DR.USER_ID userId, DR.DR_DATE drDate, DR.DR_MATCHING_STATE drMatchingState, DR.BENEFIT_ID benefitId, DR.DR_ALBUM_QUANTITY drAlbumQuantity, DR.DR_CONTENT drContent, A.ALBUM_ID AS "album.albumId", A.ALBUM_NAME AS "album.albumName", A.ARTIST AS "album.artist", A.COVER AS "album.cover" FROM DONATION_REQUEST DR, BENEFIT B, ALBUM A WHERE DR.DR_ID = #{drId} AND DR.BENEFIT_ID = B.BENEFIT_ID AND B.ALBUM_ID = A.ALBUM_ID

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DONATION_REQUEST (DR_ID, USER_ID, DR_DATE, DR_MATCHING_STATE, BENEFIT_ID, DR_ALBUM_QUANTITY, DR_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_BR.NEXTVAL, #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{drDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{drMatchingState, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{benefitId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{drAlbumQuantity, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{drContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
